red_flags: know if this is the right sub to post this but here goes:
have the insane interview requirements that tech companies do
put up a huge technical hurdle
want to sound like one of those people who say that they did something with 100% accuracy and actually did it with like 60%, but I really did do every
on java technical test, and I joke you not
